name: 午餐13
description:
This game contains two separate story lines:
Flesh Machine and The Road to Freedom
These two stories are in the same future background and the game system is different.



Flesh Machine
The Flesh Machine has added moral values and focuses on the moral choice of the protagonist.
The end of the game will also be changed by your actions.
According to your own understanding and judgment of things, there are three different endings left for everyone to taste.
The game also added vitality values, as well as restrictions on weapons, ammunition and weights.
And more emphasis on survival.

The Road to Freedom
This story is about freedom, humanity, and he praise to people who can insist on maintaining goodness and justice even in darkness.
The game system of this independent story is different from "Flesh Machine".
There is no upgrade concept at all.
The proportion of items is stronger than that of equipment.
The power of weapons is not important, only focusing on pertinence.
The size of the enemy's volume is the key to equip with the right weapon.
